summary: The module defines a suite of unit tests that verify the authorization logic for creating various CKAN entities such as API tokens, package members, datasets, and user accounts. It checks that unauthenticated users are blocked while authenticated users with appropriate roles, organization membership, or admin privileges are allowed, using helper fixtures to set up test data.
